## [crypto 50] Substitution2

Thu hồi lại mapping từ `msg` -> `s_box` bằng hàm:

```python
offset = 1
enc = '_JVYYRB_QFX_PKKEYKVSQJREHA_HD_JZGBMR_FBFG_HG'
msg = ''

sbox_rev = []
for i in range(0,len(enc),5):
    for j in range(5):
        letter = enc[i+j]
        if letter == "_":
            sbox_rev.append(letter)
            continue
        temp = ALPHABET.index(letter)
        
        if temp - offset < 0:
            temp += n
            
        sbox_rev.append(temp-offset)
    offset = (offset*3+4 )%n
```
Sau đó sử dụng web để decode `s_box_rev`: https://www.boxentriq.com/code-breaking/cryptogram

FLAG: `HCMUS-CTF{NO_SPACES_AND_POLYALPHABETIC_IS_SECURE_ISNT_IT}`
